flowRoot.flowPara: Academic workshop; systematic review of urban case studies on demand-side energy transitions; integration and reflection
Typology of countries with similar risks; map of typology versus global mitigation space; identified exemplary and deviant cases
Theoretical survey and compilation of data on risk dimensions; stylized facts on correlations, trends and drivers
Physical and financial commitments to fossil fuel extraction and use
The role and abilities of states to direct SD transitions
Pre-existing disparities that heighten the political costs of SD transitions
